item.title: Fixed! please lock!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:5, topic:267140”][code]case 162:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionTimer = 30;
stillgfx(401, absY, absX);
for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(2890);
txt4 = “TaStE vEnGeAnCe!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
sendMessage(“Your opponent is hit with vengeance!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You must wait 30 seconds before casting vengeance again!”);

                    }[/code][/quote]

Thanks, it automaticaly went to the shop case so i had to add a break; but thanks ALOT for the code.

Also, thanks to everyone who tried to help

Read full topic

[code]case 162:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
actionTimer = 30;
stillgfx(401, absY, absX);
for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(2890);
txt4 = “TaStE vEnGeAnCe!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
sendMessage(“Your opponent is hit with vengeance!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You must wait 30 seconds before casting vengeance again!”);
